author: Jay

review: At first I was impressed. I bought it on day one.  Then it started working sporadically if at all. Sometimes Chrome browser stuff will stream - sometimes not. Sometimes Netflix shows the Chromecast icon on the Nexus 7 and my phone - sometimes not. Sometimes it completely disappears from the network - sometimes it is there. When it goes bye-bye it is a pain to get it reconnected. And the apps that were on the way at launch (Pandora for one) - no where to be found. My advice and solution - if your laptop or desktop has HDMI out - but a nice long cable (25 footers are ten bucks here at Amazon) plug it in - mirror or extend your screen - then you can stream EVERYTHING - and it works ALL the time...
author: Ed Osworth "The Joy Professor"
